subject: Re: FS,
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Wellll, I have a site with some of the older voices where they told me early "you are the woman....", so no it' snot a guise, it me. 

http://purplealiengirl.tripod.com/



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> What they are asking you for is a simple blessing, or say the two words  
> "Our Father" that should help them to open the white light portal and help to  
> cross them over.  You guide may be Princess Kira, I would bet she lived one 
>  time, you could do a search for her, or you might ask my guide Lydia to 
> help you  identify her for you.  Lydia recently came through for me over the  
> radio(box), and she even responded to Sharon over her box, Sharon was really 
>  surprised I guess, I could hear Lydia say, after Sharon asked for her, my 
> Lydia  said "if your good" in other words, Sharon must get naughty 
> sometimes, so Lydia  wanted her to be good, then she would come through.  The last 
> time I heard  Lydia's voice was back in 1974 I am so happy to hear from her 
> again.   Purple is also the color of my main guide's robes, she lived long, 
> long ago, she  came from what is now Turkey, she was a rich well to do 
> business lady in her  day, and made and sold purple garment's  to the rich, she 
> always wears  purple robes herself, and is known as the purple lady, she was/is 
> a healer, and  she and her entire household became Christian, she used to 
> allow Peter and Paul  and other's to hold secret meetings at her home when 
> they were in her  area.  She got the purple dye from shell fishes off the 
> Mediterranean  sea coasts, had vats of purple dye, and produced the purple color 
> in  clothing.  She recently came through for me, she comes from the highest 
>  Heaven, I knew her voice right away, so I know this is real.  Here are a  
> couple of her recordings of Lydia, she is my "main control," guide and has 
> been  with me all my life, and came up with a few of my ancestors as well.   
> Bonnie
> In the first one Sharon is asking at my request for Lydia to come forward,  
> she says her name loud and clear, then I ask her to give me her identifying 
>  color, she says, "purple."  I don't know what type of box Sharon was 
> using,  but rest assured it was not a radio, must have been a Franks or a Joe's  
> model.  She does come through on my little radio sometimes, but she is very  
> busy, and had to come a long way into this heavy atmosphere, she is always  
> working over there, nice lady, and I am blessed to have her as my main 
> guide.In  this last one with Sharon, Lydia has someone say for her, "be good and 
> we will"  for her to come through, and speak to Sharon as Sharon asked her 
> to come through  for me <g> and she did.  One of these days, I will buy a 
> radio from  you when i get some extra cash, I think that if you use silver for 
> the wires you  may get better contact, but i could be wrong, what do i 
> know?  Bonnie
>  
>  
> In a message dated 7/28/2009 3:37:08 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
> purplealiengirl@... writes:
> 
>  
>  
>  
> I try to stay as far away from religion as possible, it just doesn't make  
> any sense, and yet "they" tell me I'm God's witness for the end of the world 
>  stuff they tell me about. They call me purple, and that's a catholic 
> thing.  Catholic it the only religion they mention. 'course they also call me a 
> girl!  Purple Princess Kiera, it's pronounced a little different than  Kira.
> 
> the different boxes give different results for me, and whether  it's 
> randiom of linear sweep. With randon last night "now we can talk to  you--help 
> you" wierd. 
> 
> Frank
> 
> --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  
> SnowfireL@,  Sn
> >
> > Naw, I would have been dead long  time ago then, I hear my named called 
> all 
> > the time, it's usually my  mom letting me know she's around, without the 
> > radio (box) I've heard  it called, when I'm trying to sleep, in my ear 
> too. I 
> > was once  listening to yahoo chat where someone was giving their idea of 
> >  Scripture, and the religion they belonged to, which had certain beliefs, 
> that  
> > I did not agree with, I feel asleep, and I heard a very distinct  voice 
> come 
> > into my right ear saying, "Bonnie, I will teach you the  Bible" guess 
> that 
> > person didn't want me to listen to that person  anymore thought I'd be 
> led 
> > astray or something. But, little do they  realize my conviction is so 
> > strong, it will never brake down, sure I  get upset sometimes when things 
> don't 
> > always go my way, but nothing  can take what I know away that is, what I 
> know 
> > to be true. It's all a  matter of perception, that is so, but in one way 
> > or another we are  all shown at some point, that there really is a "Prime 
> > Mover," and  there really is no death, it's only becoming unwired from 
> our 
> >  physical body, and going home. Bonnie
> > Here are a couple more  files,
> > One is of a couple fella's name's, and the other one is telling  me I 
> guess 
> > to get use to feeling tired, geez great! 
> > 
> >  
> > In a message dated 7/28/2009 12:26:30 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
> > purplealiengirl@ purplealie
> > 
> > 
> > 
> >  
> > There's another meaning---when you talk to the spirits it's talking  to 
> > death, maybe in a metaphorical way, and when they call your name  that's 
> like 
> > death calling your name--maybe? Just a thought.
> >  
> > Frank-S
> > 
> > --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroup --- In _EVP-ITC@ya_EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ 
> (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ) ,  
> > SnowfireL@, Sn
> > >
> > > Yeah, they are calling your  name out twice in the same 7 minutes, they 
> > must 
> > > like  you a lot.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > In a message dated  7/27/2009 4:25:33 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, 
> > > purplealiengirl@  purplealie
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> >  > Really interesting- Really interesting-<WB<WBR>--<WBR>see  another 
> examp
> > someone 
> > > getting much more than I  get
> > > 
> > > hmmm "Frank Sumption--new" 
> > >  
> > > F-S
> > > 
> > > --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroup --- In  _EVP-IT_EVP- --- In _EVP-ITC --- 
> > (mailto:_EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) ) ) ,  
> > > SnowfireL@, Sn
> > > >
> > > > Hi  Frank,
> > > > Did you get this message? They were asking for you,  this was a few 
> > days 
> > > > ago, over my radio the RS  20-125 they sound very clear to me, didn't 
> > say 
> > > >  what they wanted maybe I can go through the recording, and see what 
> >  else 
> > > they 
> > > > are saying. They like to watch  baseball sometimes on my big screen, 
> > had 
> > > a 
> >  > > whole group of them here last weekend, for fun I asked them where  
> they 
> > > were 
> > > > in the house, they said "all  around" and "4 are sitting on the 
> floor," 
> > I 
> > > > said,  well I must walk right through you people then, they said 
> "yes" 
> > I  
> > > > asked them if they felt any sensation, they said they do  feel when 
> we 
> > > walk 
> > > > through them. I always ask  them if they want football or baseball, 
> > they 
> > > say  
> > > > "baseball" I had one spirit fella here routing for Seattle,  it was 
> the 
> > > > Tigers _Mariners game, since I'm not much into  sports, I wasn't 
> really 
> > > sure if 
> > > > it was a  rerun or not, but they seemed to be happy, when I went into 
> > my  
> > > > room to work, I could hear them in the front room chatting  amongst 
> > > > themselves. Sometimes it's neat to have company out  here, and I 
> don't 
> > > even have to 
> > > > feed them.  Would you know anything about who the fella is in the 
> > second 
> >  > > one? He is saying "save a company."
> > > > Bonnie
